statements: SELECT * FROM access_control_rules;
SELECT rule_id, permission FROM access_control_rules WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_control_rules WHERE resource_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, grant_date, expiry_date FROM access_control_rules WHERE permission = 'READ';
SELECT permission, grant_date FROM access_control_rules ORDER BY expiry_date DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_control_rules WHERE user_id = 1 AND permission = 'read';
SELECT rule_id, user_id, permission FROM access_control_rules WHERE resource_id = 10 ORDER BY grant_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM access_control_rules WHERE resource_id IN (5, 8, 12);
SELECT * FROM access_control_rules WHERE expiry_date > '2022-05-01' AND grant_date < '2022-04-01';
SELECT user_id, permission, grant_date FROM access_control_rules WHERE user_id = 3 AND permission LIKE '%write%' ORDER BY grant_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_control_rules WHERE permission_type = 'read';
SELECT rule_id, rule_name FROM access_control_rules WHERE rule_id = 3;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM access_control_rules WHERE rule_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_permissions WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM access_control_rules WHERE permission_type = 'read';
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM user_permissions WHERE user_role = 'admin' ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM access_control_rules WHERE rule_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM access_control_rules JOIN user_permissions ON user_role = 'admin' AND permission_type = 'write';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_permissions WHERE user_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM access_rules;
SELECT user_id, resource_id, permission FROM access_rules WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name FROM resources ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_rules INNER JOIN users ON access_rules.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, resource_name FROM users JOIN resources ON users.user_id = resources.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM access_rules WHERE permission = 'read';
SELECT user_id, resource_id, permission FROM access_rules ORDER BY user_id DESC, permission ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_controls;
SELECT user_id, resource FROM access_controls ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT permission, user_id FROM access_controls WHERE resource='example_resource';
SELECT DISTINCT permission FROM access_controls;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM access_controls WHERE resource='protected_resource' AND permission='read';
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, resource FROM access_controls WHERE resource LIKE '%document%';
SELECT user_id, permission FROM access_controls WHERE user_id = 100 AND permission = 'read';
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT resource_name, permission_name FROM resources r JOIN permissions p ON r.resource_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM access_rules;
SELECT user_id, permission, resource_id FROM access_rules;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT role_name FROM roles;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles;
SELECT * FROM access_rules ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, resource_id, permission FROM access_rules WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT role_id FROM user_roles;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources WHERE resource_type IN ('file', 'database') ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
